title: Personalized Learning Program in the Java Programming Language

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies, experience in high-level project execution, and understanding of basic Java syntax
context.additional_context: Most learners primarily use smartphones as their learning tool, with limited PC access. Progress is periodically monitored and feedback provided through formative assessments. Emphasizes code writing and reading comprehension training optimized for mobile environments.

learning_goals: Cultivation of Java application design and implementation skills utilizing core object-oriented programming concepts (classes, inheritance, polymorphism).
Completion of over 80% of personalized programming assignments via a learning material recommendation system, with improved code expressiveness.
Achievement of 75%+ accuracy in weekly formative assessments, strengthened code reading skills, and incorporation of personalized feedback.

resources: Two Public PCs with Installable JAVA IDE
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
